introduction: This web application template is meant to use only a minimal stack of libraries. The intention is to provide you with a set of tools to get started and let's you grow your stack of libraries with your application. Some of the key features this setup supports out of the box are:

features.buildSupport: Full build support including unit tests, coverage, documentation and minification

librariesInfo: The libraries chosen in this application are:

libraries.lodash: lodash for it's common list and map functions
libraries.jquery: jQuery for simple modification of the DOM
libraries.moment: moment.js for the handling of dates and times, and their localizations

switchLanguage: To view this page in German, click here
